text: Pedro Pablo Osorio Nicolás (born 29 December 1965 in Orizaba, Veracruz) is a Mexican football manager and former player. Osorio played eight matches for Mexico between 1988 and 1991. ==References== Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican football managers Category:Mexican footballers Category:Toros Neza footballers Category:Liga MX players Category:Footballers from Veracruz Category:People from Orizaba, Veracruz Category:Association footballers not categorized by position Category:Mexico international footballers
title: Pedro Pablo Osorio
